title: Strategies for Enhancing Teaching Presence in Online Mathematics Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and experience in solving real-life problems
context.additional_context: Learners use their own devices (BYOD) and solve real-life math problems through collaborative learning projects.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to apply mathematical concepts through collaborative problem-solving processes with peers on online discussion boards.
Learners revise and improve project deliverables at least three times based on structured feedback (individual/group) from instructors.
Learners deepen conceptual understanding by resolving five or more cognitive questions arising during interactions with instructors via real-time video sessions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
